💎 Pricing & Packages

Growth takes time, courage, and commitment.
These offerings are designed to match different journeys — whether you explore solo, with a partner, or as part of a team.

🌱 Solo Explorer

For the independent seeker who prefers self-paced exploration.

  • Full course access
  • Interactive growth tools
  • Shadow & Growth modules
  • Optional add-ons for Relationship course

Premium Rate

Start Solo

🪞 Partner Journey

The most powerful path. Best for couples, business partners, or close friends.

  • Shared course access (2 seats)
  • Exercises designed for two
  • Exclusive relationship dynamics toolkit
  • Priority support for pair learning

Base Rate

Grow Together

🌍 Group & Teams

For organizations, families, or circles of friends ready to grow collectively.

  • Flexible group seats
  • Facilitator resources
  • Conflict resolution & trust-building tools
  • Custom packages available

Custom Pricing

💡 Why Invest?

  • 🔍 Deeper self-awareness — see what you normally can’t.
  • 🪞 Better relationships — understand projection & conflict patterns.
  • 🌱 Sustainable growth — interactive, reflective, and playful.
  • 🚀 Long-term value — not just information, but transformation.

Disclaimer

These programs are designed as reflective learning experiences.
They are not a substitute for therapy, counselling, or clinical intervention.
